pkgmetadata.longdescription: Consistent Significance Controlled Variable Selection in Linear Regression // Provide consistent significance controlled variable selection procedure with different directions (forward, backward, stepwise) based on diverse criteria (Mallows' Cp, AIC, BIC, adjusted r-square, p-value). The algorithm selects a final model with only significant variables based on a correction choice of False Discovery Rate, Bonferroni, or no correction.
